name: PL-10
description:
Movements: 

-click to shoot / confirm options

-Z or W for up

-Q or A for left 

-D for right 

-S for down

-P for pause 

-Left click for shot 

Welcome to PL-10 in this Bullet Hell Game, you must kill all enemies within 10 seconds before the next wave comes. 

Before the start of each level, you're given an upgrade that will totally change the flow of the game.

Think you can manage all 3 levels ? Find out now by playing PL-10 !
